node.statement: Step 1.4.4 (Chern-Simons correspondence): The Turaev-Viro invariant TV_r(M) equals |Z_CS(M; SU(2), k)|^2 where Z_CS is the Chern-Simons partition function at level k = r-2 (Turaev-Walker theorem). Thus the non-melonic corrections to the q-BLM model at q = root of unity are controlled by 3D Chern-Simons theory, providing a direct link between the q-deformed melonic model and 3D topological quantum gravity.
